item

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • item.Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    The class constructs an item witch stores the items name cost price, sale price, reorder point and reorder amount.
    Author:
    Jacob Lyons

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Item(int amount, java.lang.String name, double costPrice, double salePrice, int reorderPoint, int reorderAmount)
      Constructs an item class witch does not include temperature
      Item(int amount, java.lang.String name, double costPrice, double salePrice, int reorderPoint, int reorderAmount, int temperature)
      Constructs an item class
